articles.title: Chargers CB J.C. Jackson not expected to play Week 1 vs. Raiders after recent ankle surgery - NFL.com
articles.description: J.C. Jackson's status for the Chargers' Week 1 matchup versus the Las Vegas Raiders was already dubious after having surgery on his ankle only a couple weeks ago. And it looks like the tight turnaround is not going to work out for the cornerback.
